reference.title: Tools and Gadgets Used in AirClassroom
reference.shortdesc: Here is a compilation of the various tools and gadgets that will or might be needed to make presentations in the rooms 360 and 180 in Shanks Hall.

section.p: You will most likely need some of the following:

ul.li: Adequate speakers for any audio or video presentation
Working internet (Shanks has internet problems sometimes so please make sure)
